Verses: 1 egipthile Dhaaniyam Undendru Yaakkobu Arindhu, Than Kumaararai Nokki: Neengal Oruvar Mugaththai Oruvar Paarththukkondirukkiradhu Enna?
2 egipthile Dhaaniyam Undendru Kelvippadukiren; Naam Saagaamal Uyirodirukkumbati Neengal Avvidaththukkup Poi, Namakkaagath Dhaaniyam Kollungal Endraan.
3 yoseppin Sagodharar Paththupper Dhaaniyankolla Egipthukkup Ponaargal.
4 yoseppin Thambiyaagiya Benyameenukku Edho Mosam Varum Endru Solli, Yaakkobu Avanai Avan Sagodhararode Anuppavillai.
5 kaanaan Dhesaththile Panjam Undaayirundhabadiyaal, Dhaaniyam Kollappogiravargaludanekooda Isravelin Kumaararum Ponaargal.
6 yoseppu Adhdhesaththukku Adhipadhiyaayirundhu, Dhesaththin Janangal Yaavarukkum Vitraan. Yoseppin Sagodharar Vandhu, Mugamguppurath Tharaiyile Vizhundhu Avanai Vananginaargal.

7 yoseppu Avargalaip Paarththu, Than Sagodharar Endru Arindhukondaan; Arindhum Ariyaadhavanpolak Kadinamaai Avargalode Pesi: Neengal Engeyirundhu Vandheergal Endru Kettaan; Adharku Avargal: Kaanaan Dhesaththilirundhu Dhaaniyam Kollavandhom Endraargal.
8 yoseppu Avargalaith Than Sagodharar Endru Arindhum, Avargal Avanai Ariyavillai.
9 yoseppu Avargalaikkuriththuth Thaan Kanda Soppanangalai Ninaiththu, Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Vevukaarar, Dhesam Enge Thirandhukidakkiradhu Endru Paarkka Vandheergal Endraan.
10 adharku Avargal: Appadiyalla, Aandavane, Umadhu Adiyaaraagiya Naangal Dhaaniyam Kolla Vandhom.
11 naangal Ellaarum Oru Thagappanudaiya Pillaigal; Naangal Nijasthar; Umadhu Adiyaar Vevukaarar Alla Endraargal.
12 adharku Avan: Appadiyalla, Dhesam Enge Thirandhukidakkiradhu Endru Paarkkave Vandheergal Endraan.

13 appozhudhu Avargal: Umadhu Adiyaaraagiya Naangal Pannirendu Sagodharar; Kaanaan Dhesaththil Irukkira Oru Thagappan Puththirar; Ilaiyavan Ippozhudhu Engal Thagappanidaththil Irukkiraan; Oruvan Kaanaamalponaan Endraargal.
14 yoseppu Avargalai Nokki: Ungalai Vevukaarar Endru Naan Sonnadhu Sari.
15 ungal Ilaiya Sagodharan Inge Vandhaalozhiya Neengal Ingeyirundhu Purappaduvadhu Illai Endru Paarvonin Jeevanaikkondu Aanaiyittuch Sollukiren.

16 idhinaale Neengal Sodhikkappaduveergal; Ungal Sagodharanai Azhaiththu Varumbadi Ungalil Oruvanai Anuppungal; Ungalidaththil Unmai Undo Illaiyo Endru Ungal Vaarththaigal Sodhikkappadumalavum, Neengal Kaavalil Irukkavendum; Illaavittaal, Neengal Vevukaarardhaan Endru Paarvonin Jeevanaikkondu Aanaiyittuch Sollugiren Endru Solli,
17 avargal Ellaaraiyum Moondrunaal Kaavalile Vaiththaan.
18 moondraam Naalile Yoseppu Avargalai Nokki: Naan Dhevanukkup Bayappadugiravan; Neengal Uyirode Irukkumbadikku Ondru Seyyungal.

19 neengal Nijastharaanaal, Sagodhararaagiya Ungalil Oruvan Kaavarkoodaththil Kattundirukkattum; Matravargal Purappattu, Panjaththinaal Varundhugira Ungal Kutumbaththukkuth Dhaaniyam Kondupoik Koduththu,
20 ungal Ilaiya Sagodharanai Ennidaththukku Azhaiththukkonduvaarungal; Appozhudhu Ungal Vaarththaigal Meyyendru Vilangum; Neengal Saavadhillai Endraan. Avargal Appadiseygiradharku Isaindhu:

21 nammudaiya Sagodharanukku Naam Seydha Dhurogam Nammel Sumandhadhu; Avan Nammaik Kenji Vendikkondapodhu, Avanudaiya Manaviyaagulaththai Naam Kandum, Avanukkuch Sevikodaamalponome; Aagaiyaal Indha Aabaththu Namakku Nerittadhu Endru Oruvarai Oruvar Paarththuch Sollikkondaargal.

22 appozhudhu Rooban Avargalaip Paarththu: Ilaignanukku Virodhamaagap Paavamcheyyaadhirungal Endru Naan Ungalukkuch Sollavillaiyaa? Neengal Kelaamalponeergal; Ippozhudhu, Idho, Avan Iraththappazhi Nammidaththil Vaangappatukiradhu Endraan.
23 yoseppu Dhubaasiyaikkondu Avargalidaththil Pesinabadiyaal, Thaangal Sonnadhu Avanukkuth Theriyum Endru Ariyaadhirundhaargal.
24 avan Avargalai Vittu Appuram Poi Azhudhu, Thirumba Avargalidaththil Vandhu, Avargalode Pesi, Avargalil Simiyonaip Pidiththu, Avargal Kangalukku Munbaagak Kattuviththaan.

25 pinbu, Avargal Saakkugalaith Dhaaniyaththaal Nirappavum, Avargal Panaththaith Thirumba Avanavan Saakkile Podavum, Vazhikku Vendiya Aagaaraththaik Kodukkavum Yoseppu Kattalaiyittaan; Appadiye Avargalukkuch Seyyappattadhu.
26 avargal Andhath Dhaaniyaththaith Thangal Kazhudhaigalmel Etrikkondu, Avvidamvittup Purappattupponaargal.
27 thangugira Itaththile Avargalil Oruvan Than Kazhudhaikkuth Theevanam Podath Than Saakkaith Thirandhapodhu, Saakkin Vaayile Than Panam Irukkiradhaik Kandu,

28 than Sagodhararaip Paarththu, En Panam Thirumba Vandhirukkiradhu; Idho, Adhu En Saakkile Irukkiradhu Endraan. Appozhudhu Avargaludaiya Irudhayam Sorndhupoi, Avargal Bayandhu, Oruvarai Oruvar Paarththu, Dhevan Namakku Ippadich Seydhadhu Enna Endraargal.
29 avargal Kaanaan Dhesaththilulla Thangal Thagappanaagiya Yaakkobinidaththil Vandhu, Thangalukkuch Sambaviththavaigalaiyellaam Avanukku Ariviththu:
30 dhesaththukku Adhipadhiyaayirukkiravan Engalai Dhesaththai Vevupaarkka Vandhavargal Endru Enni Engalode Kadinamaaip Pesinaan.
31 naangalo Avanai Nokki: Naangal Nijasthar, Vevukaarar Alla.
32 naangal Pannirendu Sagodharar, Oru Thagappan Puththirar, Oruvan Kaanaamalponaan, Ilaiyavan Ippozhudhu Kaanaandhesaththil Engal Thagappanidaththil Irukkiraan Endrom.

33 appozhudhu Dhesaththin Adhipadhiyaanavan: Neengal Nijasthar Enbadhai Naan Ariyumbadi Ungal Sagodhararil Oruvanai Neengal Ennidaththil Vittu, Panjaththinaal Varundhugira Ungal Kutumbaththukkuth Dhaaniyam Vaangikkondupoik Koduththu,

34 ungal Ilaiya Sagodharanai Ennidaththil Azhaiththukkonduvaarungal; Adhinaale Neengal Vevukaarar Alla, Nijasthar Enbadhai Naan Arindhukondu, Ungal Sagodharanai Vitudhalai Seyven; Neengal Indhath Dhesaththile Viyaabaaramum Pannalaam Endraan Endru Sonnaargal.
35 avargal Thangal Saakkugalilulla Dhaaniyaththaik Koddukaiyil, Idho, Avanavan Saakkile Avanavan Panamudippu Irundhadhu; Andhap Panamudippugalai Avargalum Avargal Thagappanum Kandu Bayandhaargal.

36 avargal Thagappanaagiya Yaakkobu Avargalai Nokki: Ennaip Pillaiyatravanaakkugireergal; Yoseppum Illai, Simiyonum Illai; Benyameenaiyum Kondupogap Paarkkireergal; Idhellaam Enakku Virodhamaai Neritukiradhu Endraan.

37 appozhudhu Rooban Than Thagappanaip Paarththu, Avanai En Kaiyil Oppuviyum, Naan Avanaith Thirumba Ummidaththil Konduvaruven; Avanaik Konduvaraavittaal, En Irandu Kumaararaiyum Kondrupodum Endru Sonnaan.

38 adharku Avan: En Magan Ungalodekoodap Povadhillai; Avan Thamaiyan Irandhuponaan, Ivan Oruvan Meedhiyaayirukkiraan; Neengal Pogum Vazhiyil Ivanukku Mosam Nerittaal, Neengal En Naraimayiraich Sanjalaththode Paadhaalaththil Irangappannuveergal Endraan.
